name: Milos Horor Game
description: Milos Horror game - the best of its kind for bringing horror to teenagers and adults , the average age limit is 16+ , the action of Milos Horor takes place in an abandoned psychiatric hospital, where the hero-journalist faces dangers in the form of a psychopath Milos, having already entered the psycho hospital, he begins to see strange creatures. Unlike many similar games, the game character does not have a weapon, does not know how to fight, and is forced to run and hide from pursuing enemies.
